proper noun.description: A state of the eastern US, on the coast of the Atlantic Ocean, surrounding Chesapeake Bay; population 5,633,597 (est. 2008); capital, Annapolis. Colonized by England in the 17th century, it was one of the original thirteen states of the Union and ratified the US Constitution in 1788.

origin: Named after Queen Henrietta Maria, wife of Charles I.
